page.title: 10RELIGION IN N.TONBRIDGE
page.content: We interviewed 100 people,in various residential areas,on their religious beliefs.25 refused to answer,of whom 21 looked over 40;53 of those who ag- reed believed in God.11 did not bel- ieve,and another 11 couldn't decide.8 of the undecided looked over 20 and under 40.10 of the non-believers looked under 40.Most believers were Church of England,with 4 Catholics,4 with no preference,3 Baptists,2 Meth- odists and 1 Congregational.Many go to St. John's Hildenborough for Sunday church,but more go to a parish church outside the area.3 elderly people go to Cage Green church,3 to a Baptist church,and 2 to St.Saviour's Ton- bridge.Of the 38 people who go to church,12 go every week,and 21 only go about 3 times a year.5 people go between 1 and 3 times a month.
